name: Dreams (itch) (jstahn)
description:
A small dream like experience, that you can enjoy by moving with the arrow keys!

. . .

Created by

Juan Lagar (Coding and Level Design)  and Jasmin Stahn (Art, Unity assembly)

. . .

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
